chunk_analysis.page_text:
DEED
11378

This Indenture, Made the 13th day of November in the year of our Lord one thousand nine hundred and ninety one (1991)

Between

MARGARET VIOLA WILLIARD

party of the first part, and

TERENCE J. EMSWINGER and JANE A. EMSWINGER, his wife,

part ies of the second part;

Witnesseth, That the said party of the first part in consideration of Fifty Three Thousand Nine Hundred and 00/100------------($53,900.00)-----------------------------Dollars to her now paid by the said parties of the second part, does hereby grant, bargain, sell and convey unto the said parties of the second part, their heirs and assigns, forever:

All that certain lot or piece of ground situate in the Township of Clinton, County of Butler and State of Pennsylvania, more particularly bounded and described as follows, to-wit:

BEGINNING at a point in the center of a public road known as the Lerdintown Road at line of lands now or formerly of Jesse Smith, said point being the Southeast corner of the tract herein described; thence South 86 degrees 27' 30" East, a distance of 647.10 feet to a point on line of lands now or formerly of R.O. Wood; thence North 358.03 feet to a point on premises of the Bessemer and Lake Erie Railroad; thence along the same South 86 degrees 27' 30" East, a distance of 268.72 feet to a point on line of lands of formerly Marvin, now or formerly John Hoffman; thence along the same and the center of the said Lerdintown Road, South 12 degrees 13' 30" East, 476.40 feet to a point in the center of the said Lerdintown Road, the place of beginning.

CONTAINING five (5) acres, more or less, and having thereon erected a one story brick dwelling and other outbuildings.

BK1895 PG0080

BEING the same premises conveyed unto the Grantor herein by deed dated September 30, 1968 and recorded in the Butler County Recorder's Office in Deed Book 896 Page 413.

COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA
COUNTY OF BUTLER

DOCUMENTARY REALTY TRANSFER TAX STAMP
SCHOOL DISTRICT             STAMP # 5681
SOUTH BUTLER COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT
TAX PAID                    $269.50

MUNICIPALITY               STAMP # 5682
CLINTON TOWNSHIP
TAX PAID                   $269.50
                          JANIE MCKAIN
DATE 11/13/91             REGISTER & RECORDER

THIS DOCUMENT MAY (DOES) NOT SELL, CONVEY, TRANSFER, INCLUDE OR INSURE THE TITLE TO THE COAL AND RIGHT OF SUPPORT UNDERNEATH THE SURFACE LAND DESCRIBED OR REFERRED TO HEREIN, AND THE OWNER OR OWNERS OF SUCH COAL MAY HAVE (HAVE) THE COMPLETE LEGAL RIGHT TO REMOVE ALL OF SUCH COAL AND, IN THAT CONNECTION, DAMAGE MAY RESULT TO THE SURFACE OF THE LAND AND ANY HOUSE, BUILDING OR OTHER STRUCTURE ON OR IN SUCH LAND.

This statement inserted pursuant to Act No. 439 of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania of 1957 P.L. 984. The foregoing statement in and of itself shall not be construed to be an exception or reservation of the coal under the within described premises.

BK1895 PG0081

with the appurtenances;

To Have and To Hold the same unto, and for the use of the said

parties of the second part, their heirs and assigns forever,

And the said party of the first part
for herself, her heirs, executors and administrators
covenant s with the said parties of the second part their heirs
and assigns against all lawful claimants:
the same and every part thereof to Warrant and Defend.

Witness the hand and seal of the said party of the first part.

Margaret Viola Hilliard [SEAL]
[Multiple SEAL markings]

Attest: [signature]

Commonwealth of Pennsylvania,
County of Butler } ss:

On this the 13th day of November, A.D. 19 81
before me a Notary Public, the undersigned officer, personally appeared
Margaret Viola Hilliard known to me
(or satisfactorily proven) to be the person whose name is subscribed to the within instrument and
acknowledged that she executed the same for the purposes therein contained.

In Witness Whereof I hereunto set my hand and official seal.

[Notary Signature]
Robert A. Scott
Butler County, Pennsylvania
My Commission expires June 18, 1984

BK1895 PG0082

Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
County of [blank]

Certificate of Residence

The undersigned hereby certifies that the precise residence of the grantee herein named is/are as follows: 358 Brewer Road, Saxonburg, PA 16056

[Signature]

Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
County of Butler

Recorded on this 13 day of November A.D. 1991, in the Recorder's Office of Butler County, in Record Book Vol. 1895 page 80

Given under my hand and the seal of the said office, the day and year aforesaid.

[Signature]
Recorder

BK1895 PG0083

[Note: There appears to be a small logo/icon for what seems to be a property or deed record system, but the text is not clearly legible]

[There's also a notary/acknowledgment section at the top of the document that is largely blank/unfilled]
